channel.title: NPC block anim
channel.description:
OK. I'v raged constantly over this one.
[code] public int GetNPCBlockAnim(int id) { switch (id) { [/code]
is where u are ment to tell the server which block animation to use... and the code is simply
[code]case 2686: return 6944;[/code]
if you add [code]break;[/code] it will be wrong.
this FAILS! does anyone know how to actually get the block animation to work? my npc simply turns invisible. the i know animation code is right it's simply when i tell it what animation to use it does nothing!
any help would be great. thanks

item.title: NPC block anim
item.dc:creator: @mod_ethan mod ethan
item.description:
@mod_ethan wrote:

ok but wouldn’t that mean the NPC would only use that block animation when u use verac’s flail?

item.title: NPC block anim
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

public int GetBlockAnim() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755) // veracs fail { return 2063; }

That’s the first one under my GetBlockAnim. I’ll explain it. It’s saying if the weapon equals 4755 then when they block it’ll do the 2063 emote for blocking.

Read full topic
